Description_lang: Transforms an enemy into a rat, forcing it to wander around and deal $17739s1 Nature damage every $t3 sec to nearby allies for up to $d. While wandering, the rat cannot attack or cast spells, but regenerates very quickly. Only one target can be cursed at a time.
AuraDescription_lang: Cannot attack or cast spells.Inflicting $17739s1 Nature damage every $t3 sec to nearby allies.Increased health regeneration.
